data.current_summary: Returns the forecast purpose of a trip
data.summary_suggestion: Predict the purpose of a trip
data.description_suggestion: Predicts the likely purpose of a trip based on provided travel parameters such as departure date, destination, length of stay, and other contextual factors. This operation uses machine learning models to classify the trip purpose (e.g., business, leisure, connecting flight). Returns a prediction object containing the forecasted purpose and confidence score. Requires valid travel parameters as input. No side effects or state changes occur.
